table.title: Logons via VPN
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis sc_status=200 | lookup offices c_ip OUTPUT office | where office=="VPN" | stats latest(_time) as _time by src_user | table _time,src_user | rename src_user as "Username"

map.title: Logons by Location
map.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis sc_status=200 | iplocation c_ip | lookup offices c_ip OUTPUT office,office_lat,office_lon | eval lat=if(isnotnull(office_lat),office_lat,lat) | eval lon=if(isnotnull(office_lon),office_lon,lon) | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon count
